name: Escape Ninja Prison
description:
Escape this Ninja prison. The Storyline will tell you the 2 sides of the story

Space to attack and interact

Move through orange doors

collect lightning icon to get superspeed

collect fire icon to draw fire, literally draw the fire to attack people.

Stage 1-kill the guard

2-dodge the shurikans, the door will unlock in 7 seconds

3-catch the keys

4-enter the password and defeat the boss

5- If you read this far than congratulation because most people don't even read the description.
